name: Rifai Sicilia Octant Epoch 7
description:
Calling all octant community members and $GLM stakers! As a heartfelt thank you for your incredible support of public goods and planet-healing projects during Epoch 7, we present you with a special token of our gratitude: an official Rifai Sicilia membership NFT.

This digital treasure symbolizes our appreciation as we transform Sicilia and the Mediterranean Bioregion with vibrant food forests and onchain economies. Who knows? Perhaps one day you'll be able to harvest real bounty from what we've sown together through this NFT. From virtual seeds to real-world treesâ€”this is regeneration in action!
